head.title: Cubical accessibility and bounds on curves on surfaces
head.abstract: We bound the size of -dimensional cubulations of finitely presented groups. We apply this bound to obtain acylindrical accessibility for actions on CAT(0) cube complexes and bounds on curves on surfaces.

outline._note: We would like to thank Jonah Gaster for fruitful conversations on Question \[curves on surfaces?\]. The second author acknowledges the support received by the ETH Zurich Postdoctoral Fellowship Program and the Marie Curie Actions for People COFUND Program.
